creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
[Transferred from bug 29884]

HTTP Sampler 2 needs to be better integrated, e.g. Proxy should be able to
create samples.

Should be possible to switch the HTTP implementation without needing to edit the
JMX file.

creator: alf@i100.no
text:
I think this is fixed now, by fixing bug 41876. It is now possible to specify in
the GUI of the HTTP Proxy Server that you want to put "HTTP Sampler 2" into the
test plan.

I don't know of any other places where "HTTP Sampler 2" is not available.
